_comment: Example of Query-Only Command - Use this structure for commands that can only be queried (no set form)
_description: Template for commands that can only be queried (no set form). These commands should have commandType: 'query' and syntax should only contain query form.
description: This query-only command returns [description of what it returns]. This should explicitly state 'query-only' in the description.

examples.description: Description of what this query returns.

shortDescription: Short description (first part of description, typically 80-100 characters)
name: QueryOnlyCommand
